title-group.article-title: Retraction Note: Nicotine promotes breast cancer metastasis by stimulating N2 neutrophils and generating pre-metastatic niche in lung

body.p: Retraction to: Nature Communications 10.1038/s41467-020-20733-9, published online 20 January 2021
The authors have stated that these duplications occured due to errors in data handling, which may affect the reported results.
All authors agree to this retraction.
